mapper.select: SELECT CSEQ, CNOTIFY, CIMG, CDATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, CSEQ, CNOTIFY, CIMG, CDATE, CENABLE, SELLERID FROM COUPON) WHERE NO BETWEEN #{rowstart} AND #{rowend} AND CENABLE ='Y' AND SELLERID = #{sellerid}
SELECT COUNT(CSEQ) FROM COUPON WHERE CENABLE = 'Y'
SELECT CSEQ, CNOTIFY, CIMG, COUPON FROM COUPON WHERE CSEQ = #{cseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON (CSEQ, SELLERID, COUPON, CDATE, CNOTIFY, CENABLE, CIMG, CTHUMBIMG) VALUES (COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sellerid}, #{coupon}, SYSDATE,#{cnotify},'Y', #{cimg}, #{cthumbimg})
INSERT INTO COUPONDETAIL (CDSEQ, CSEQ, SELLERID, CDSTATE) VALUES (COUPONDETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, COUPON_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{sellerid}, #{cdstate})
mapper.update: UPDATE COUPON SET CENABLE = 'N' WHERE CENABLE = 'Y' AND CDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-30)
mapper.select: SELECT CSEQ, CNOTIFY, CIMG, CDATE FROM COUPON WHERE CENABLE = 'Y' AND SELLERID = #{sellerid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPONBOX (CBSEQ, ID, CSEQ, SELLERID, CBDATE) VALUES (COUPONBOX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}), (SELECT CSEQ FROM COUPON WHERE CENABLE = 'Y' AND CSEQ = #{cseq}), (SELECT SELLERID FROM SELLER WHERE SELLERID = 'admin01'), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c2.CNOTIFY, c2.CIMG FROM COUPONBOX c, COUPON c2 WHERE c.CSEQ = c2.CSEQ AND ID = #{id} AND c2.CENABLE = 'Y'
SELECT CSEQ, CNOTIFY, CIMG, CDATE FROM COUPON WHERE CSEQ = #{cseq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COUPONBOX WHERE CBDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7)
